page.title: 14VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The village hall is one of the newest buildings in the village. It has been built on the recreation ground so that it can be used by various sports organisations. The idea of building a village hall came from a meeting of villagrs held in 1977- after the Silver Jubilee celebrations and since then money has been collected to pay for the hall. Mr.P.Gordon was elected chairman and Mr.F.Johnson treasurer.In 1984 they were able to arrange for the hall to be built. It is a timber framed hall and will be well insulated. The cost will be more than Â£93000 of which Â£18000 has been by the village. Grants and donations have brought in another Â£50000 and Â£25000 has been borrowed.Although not formally opened the hall is used regularly.
